Description:
Position Title:                StorekeeperEmployment Type:       Full TimeSalary:             up to 3.5K AED all inclusive depending on experience and qualifications plus shared accommodationJob Location:                 Abu Dhabi, UAE About the Hiring Company:One of the leading chemical manufacturing companies in Abu DhabiControl material in and out of the yards to ensure of proper arrangement of store and/or warehouse.
Loading/unloading of raw materials and finished goods as per production plan.
Mange his team to perform and execute the jobs needed as per plan.
Mange drums stock in the yard by sorting according to type and dates of supply with high tendency of cleanness and accuracy.
Report of any missing items on time and summary of items count as per plan.Skills
Skills:
Open to Asian nationals
Male, 25 to 35 years old
Atleast 3 years experience in the UAE

Preferred.Nationality: East Asia; South Asia; Southeast Asia
